title: Self-Regulated Science Learning Competency Enhancement Program Using Learning Analytics Dashboards

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Science inquiry activities using VR simulations in BYOD environments, with learning analytics dashboards visualizing individual learning patterns to enhance self-regulated learning

learning_goals: Learners can interpret scientific experiment data with over 80% accuracy through VR simulation.
Learners can revise and improve their learning plans at least three times based on dashboard feedback.
Learners can achieve a project completion rate of over 90% by utilizing self-regulated learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
